titleStmt.title: The ranting whores resolution wherein you will finde that her only treasure consisteth in being a lady of pleasure. To the tune of, General Monks march.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for F. Coles, M. Wright, T. Vere. and W. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
